name: James E. BOONE, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney General for the Commonwealth of Penna, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at Sci at Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents

parties: James E. BOONE, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney General for the Commonwealth of Penna, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at Sci at Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Writ of Habeas Corpus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
James E. BOONE, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney General for the Commonwealth of Penna, James T. Wynder, Superintendent at Sci at Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.
No. 161 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 2, 2007.
